projectile

Class Projectile_blackBeam

  • java.lang.Object

      • gameObject.MovableObject
        • projectile.Projectile
          • projectile.Projectile_blackBeam

  • public class Projectile_blackBeam
extends Projectile
    Description:
    Defines individual projectile
    Requires input of coordinates, and outputs direction and speed of projectile

    2014-03-31
    Version:
    1.0
